sentences.en: A new generation of scientists became fascinated by dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 新一代科学家对恐龙研究着了迷。

sentences.en: Brown was fascinated by people's quirks and foibles.
sentences.cn: 布朗对人们的种种怪癖十分着迷。
中国一直令我心驰神往。
她的美貌使所有的男孩子都着了迷.

sentences.en: I sat on the stairs and watched, fascinated.
sentences.cn: 我坐在楼梯上出神地观望。

sentences.en: I was always fascinated by the acrobats at the circus.
sentences.cn: 我总是着迷于马戏团里的杂技演员.

sentences.en: I was fascinated by her voice.
I was fascinated by the different people who did business with me.
sentences.cn: 我对那些跟我做生意的形形色色的人非常感兴趣。

sentences.en: Melina was hanging on his every word, fascinated.
sentences.cn: 梅利娜凝神细听着他的每句话，被深深吸引住了。

sentences.en: She was fascinated at the spectacle of a rocket launching.
sentences.cn: 她被发射火箭的壮观场面强烈地吸引住了.

sentences.en: The boy has become fascinated with making model aeroplanes.
sentences.cn: 这孩子做飞机模型都入了迷了.

sentences.en: The changing vivid colours of the sunset fascinated the eye.
sentences.cn: 日落时变化多端的色彩使人看得入迷.

sentences.en: The children watched, fascinated, as the picture began to appear.
sentences.cn: 电影开始以后孩子们入迷地观看着。

sentences.en: The children were fascinated by all the toys in the shop windows.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子被商店橱窗里所有的玩具迷住了.

sentences.en: The scenic beauty of the place entranced [ fascinated ] the visitors.
sentences.cn: 这里的美丽风光把游客们 迷住 了.

sentences.en: This child was fascinated by the plots in the novel.
sentences.cn: 这个小孩被小说的情节吸引住了.

words.tran_cn: 迷人的；吸引人的；使人神魂颠倒的
使着迷；使陶醉（fascinate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: extremely interested by something or someone
